title: [Etaenia's Jewels]
description: Blue, green, and purple striped rugs are scattered about on the floor, like small islands, while an oak counter partially spans one side of the room.  A jeweler's loupe rests upon the counter at one end, and jewels in the process of being cut, cleaned, and polished sit at the other, in front of a padded stool.  Curtains matching the rugs hang upon the windows that adorn the walls, the curtains drawn back allowing daylight to enter.

Blue, green, and purple striped rugs are scattered about on the floor, like small islands, while an oak counter partially spans one side of the room.  A jeweler's loupe rests upon the counter at one end, and jewels in the process of being cut, cleaned, and polished sit at the other, in front of a padded stool.  Curtains matching the rugs hang upon the windows that adorn the walls, and crystal lamps are hung between the windows, providing additional lighting.
